name: Wild West Shootout
overview:
Wild West Shootout is a one or two player target shooter that is innocent fun for the whole family.

With 5 different levels to choose from, players are challenged to shoot the funny-looking bad guys to earn points and win tickets. Throughout each level, there are breakable targets that score surprise bonus points. Rescue the hostages to score bonus points. The more points you score, the more tickets you win. But, aim carefully, if you shoot a hostage you will be penalized and lose points.
